extendedInfo.description: Indru is a free Tamil daily calendar & rasipalan Android mobile app. Indru is an attempt to bring our Tamil thinasari to mobiles. This app will help you to keep track of all our auspicious days, align you with various timings like Rahukalam, Yamagandam, Kuligai, Karanam , Sunrise, Sunset etc., You can find out the birth zodiac signs and get the horoscope chart for any day easily with this free app. Of course, start off the day brighter with the daily quotes and our astrological forecasts (Rasipalans). All in all, its a simple free Tamil calendar with holidays, festivals and auspicious times.-- Traditional Tamil daily calendar-- Lists festival days, national holidays, amavasai, pournami, pradosham, karthigai, ashtami, navami for the whole year-- Status bar notification about important days and other special tamil/national occassions-- Easy forward and backward Tamil calendar swipes, pinch zoom, drag, single tap and double tap support-- Supports Offline mode: you can downoad tamil calendars monthwise and no internet needed for the app-- Various calendar image resolutions-- Easy connection mode and space management-- Completely FREE!Did you grow up tearing the daily Tamil calendar pages ? Are you now in a place where these are no longer easily available & you wish you had this info at your fingertips ? You can now have the daily Tamil daily calendar (thinasari) & Rasipalans at your fingertips for free! Know your auspicious days and timings (Rahukalam, Yamagandam, Kuligai, Karanam , sunrise, sunset) with easy touches. Start your day brighter with the daily quotes, birth zodiac signs & astrological forecasts (Rasipalans).Lots of efforts have gone into developing this quality and totally free Tamil daily calendar app for Android/iPhone. If you have any suggestions or comments please drop me a note using the contact form in this page. If you are satisfied with the app, encourage us by rating this Tamil daily calendar app.Recent Changes:Version 3.5New:1. Offline calendar: easier and faster way to download monthly calendars   2. Easy access for festival days, national holidays, amavasai, pournami, pradosham, karthigai, ashtami, navami for the whole year using a new menu3. Status bar notifications. One notification per event.4. UI: single tap, double tap to reset the calendar sizes and positionFix:1. Various app stability fixesVersion 3.0New:1. Full support for Offline and Online calendar mode2. Offline mode - no internet needed - ability to download Tamil daily calendars for any month and use the app totally offline3. Online mode - now supports smaller Tamil daily calendar pages to save bandwidth if you are accessing calendar over internet4. Storage space - you can now delete calendars downloaded for older months and save spaceFix:1. Calendar access now faster then before2. UI polishing and minor fixesVersion 2.2 and olderNew:1. Drag calendar and other multi touch support2. Pinch zoom in/out calendar pages3. Ability to choose different calendar date4. Easy calendar swipe to next and previous dates5. Orientation, resolution and placements for UI componentsFix:1. Fixed calendar prev and next day calculation2. Calendar page download problems fixed3. Safe handling for network connection failuresTamil Daily Calendar App, FREE Tamil Daily Calendar App, Tamil Daily Calendar 2013, Tamil Calendar 2014, Tamil Daily Calendar 2012, Offline Tamil Calendar, Download Tamil Daily Calendar, Daily Calendar

reviews.title: Good.
reviews.comment: Very good. Couple of things.. Reminding about festivals a day or two in advance will really help. Also the horizontal rotation will be really good. Thanks a lot for providing a good app.
